attributes.action: petition that the goverment look after those who have lost there company pension
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I and approx 60 thousand others have lost all or part of there company penion due to the company closure. I feel that the governments information  was misleading as we all were lead to believe that the government would not allow our pension to be lost due to company failure.The governments scheme only compensates those with less than 20 years to go untill retirement

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
